section.name: Configuration Processors Packaging
section.p: The Configuration Processors are organized as JAR archives with predefined structure. The archive contains processor descriptor file, default XML sources (default configuration), the transformation files (XSLT) and optional classes needed for processing.
Following diagram shows a content of the Price Engine Configuration Processor JAR.

subsection.name: META-INF/services
subsection.p: This directory contains the processor descriptor file com.baxter.config.processor.xml. The configuration factory will run these files in order to load processors.

subsection.name: META-INF/config/default
subsection.p: The directory contains a default configuration for the product. These are set of XML files which conform to the configuration layout for particular product.

subsection.name: META-INF/config/xsl
subsection.p: The set of transformation stylesheets used by processing to build the configurations from XML sources.

subsection.name: com/baxter/config/pe
subsection.p: The root java package for custom classes.
